H0.text: Sardinian, Cetti’s and Dartford are among varieties of which bird. Sparrow

H1.text: Sardinian, Cetti’s and Dartford are among varieties of which bird. Finch

H2.text: Sardinian, Cetti’s and Dartford are among varieties of which bird. Bunting

H3.text: Sardinian, Cetti’s and Dartford are among varieties of which bird. Warbler

A4.text: The Sardinian warbler (Curruca melanocephala) is a common and widespread Sylviidae warbler from the Mediterranean region.
